discrepancies.finding: Invoice does not indicate a over shipment
Invoice includes additional quantities of goods/services/performance as required by the credit

compliances.finding: Invoice appears to have been issued by the beneficiary
Description of the goods/services/performance is stated
Invoice includes the total quantity of goods and their weight or measurement
Invoice does not conflict with the same data appearing on other documents
Invoice includes additional charges and costs within the value shown against the stated trade term
Invoice does not require a signature or date
